results:
Based on the search results, I can provide information about "The Hobbit" by J.R.R. Tolkien as a required reading in Polish schools:

## "The Hobbit" in Polish School Curriculum

"Hobbit, czyli tam i z powrotem" (The Hobbit, or There and Back Again) is a supplementary reading in the first grade of gymnasium (middle school in the former Polish education system).

According to the reading lists for grades 4-6 of primary school, John Ronald Reuel Tolkien's "Hobbit, czyli tam i z powrotem" is included among the required readings.

In the Polish school curriculum, "Hobbit, czyli tam i z powrotem" by John Ronald Reuel Tolkien appears on the reading lists for various educational levels.

The book appears to be part of the Ministry of National Education's (MEN) curriculum framework (podstawa programowa) for Polish schools. Students confirm it is a school reading assignment, and it's commonly studied in Polish schools at the upper primary and lower secondary levels.

The search results indicate that "The Hobbit" has been consistently included in Polish school reading lists across different educational reforms, serving as an important text for introducing students to fantasy literature and adventure narratives.
